title: We go to Norwich! (공지)
content: Oh! What is this? Now! Cut it off and go up. Dembaba! One-on-one chance with the goalkeeper, Dembaba! Dembaba! Goal!!! Chelsea draw the first goal. Now! I've been dragged a little bit all the way through the first half, and it's Gerrard's deadly Steven Gerrard makes one critical mistake. Now Liverpool's heart Gerrard lost his focus at the end of the first half. The first goal at Anfield was Chelsea Dembaba of Mourinho.
author: Steven Gerrard

title: I love winter. (자유)
content:
Don't cry, snowman, not 기습 한글 기습적인 한글 front of me
Who'll catch your tears if you can't catch me, darling?
If you can't catch me, darling
Don't cry, snowman, don't leave me this way
A puddle of water can't hold me close, baby
Can't hold me close, baby
I want you to know that I'm never leaving
'Cause I'm Mrs. Snow, 'til death we'll be freezing
Yeah, you are my home, my home for all seasons
So come on, let's go
Let's go below zero and hide from the sun
I love you forever where we'll have some fun
Yes, let's hit the North Pole and live happily
Please, don't cry no tears now, it's Christmas, baby
My snowman and me
My snowman and me
Baby
